name: GEMINI (itch) (BirchTree)
description:
A timing-heavy precision platformer!  Installation

     Unzip GEMINI.zip and run the executable GEMINI.exe.


Controls

     Keyboard: WASD to move, space to jump

     Controller: Left analog stick to move, A to jump

Credits

     Programming/Sound: Seth Burchfield

     Art: Cooper Garvin & Jooan Jin

Made over the course of 4 days for the TigerDev Fall Break 2019 Jam
